overview: A COLT man, a warm day and cold water - what could be better? We brought all three together for a hot compilation of water-themed COLT films entitled "WATERBUCKS."  "WATERBUCKS" features Mark Bradshaw from "Sunbeam," Mark Gamble from "Hard Rider," Bruce Emory from "Iron Man," Joey Arena from "Accident Prone," Steve Kelso from "Intimate Hours," Jake Tanner from "Macho Mountain," and both Bruce Craig and Ralph Whitaker from the "The Senses Taker."
title: Waterbucks
